net.adamcin.oakpal.core.sling

Interface SlingSimulatorBackend

  • All Superinterfaces:
    net.adamcin.oakpal.api.ScanListener, net.adamcin.oakpal.api.SlingSimulator
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultSlingSimulator, NoopSlingSimulator

    @ProviderType
public interface SlingSimulatorBackend
extends net.adamcin.oakpal.api.SlingSimulator, net.adamcin.oakpal.api.ScanListener
    Interface defining internal-facing behavior for the SlingSimulator, primarily regarding the retrieval and processing of Sling JCR installable resources submitted by ProgressChecks.
